levers.name: China PS Packaging Reduction
levers.description: Percent reduction in polystyrene used in packaging for China. Use 100% for ban.

levers.name: EU 30 PS Packaging Reduction
levers.description: Percent reduction in polystyrene used in packaging for EU 30. Use 100% for ban.

levers.name: NAFTA PS Packaging Reduction
levers.description: Percent reduction in polystyrene used in packaging for NAFTA. Use 100% for ban.

levers.name: ROW PS Packaging Reduction
levers.description: Percent reduction in polystyrene used in packaging for rest of world. Use 100% for ban.

levers.name: China Minimum Recycled Content
levers.description: The minimum content which must come from recycyling in China.

levers.name: EU 30 Minimum Recycled Content
levers.description: The minimum content which must come from recycyling in EU 30.

levers.name: NAFTA Minimum Recycled Content
levers.description: The minimum content which must come from recycyling in NAFTA.

levers.name: ROW Minimum Recycled Content
levers.description: The minimum content which must come from recycyling in rest of world.

levers.name: China Virgin Plastic Production Cap
levers.description: Maximum million tons of annual virgin plastic production in China.

levers.name: EU 30 Virgin Plastic Production Cap
levers.description: Maximum million tons of annual virgin plastic production in EU 30.

levers.name: NAFTA Virgin Plastic Production Cap
levers.description: Maximum million tons of annual virgin plastic production in NAFTA.

levers.name: ROW Virgin Plastic Production Cap
levers.description: Maximum million tons of annual virgin plastic production in rest of world.

levers.name: China Recycling Investment
levers.description: Investment in expanded recycling infrastructure for China including both collection and processing.

levers.name: EU 30 Recycling Investment
levers.description: Investment in expanded recycling infrastructure for EU 30 including both collection and processing.

levers.name: NAFTA Recycling Investment
levers.description: Investment in expanded recycling infrastructure for NAFTA including both collection and processing.

levers.name: ROW Recycling Investment
levers.description: Investment in expanded recycling infrastructure for rest of world including both collection and processing.

levers.name: China Min Recycling Rate
levers.description: The minumum recycling rate for waste in China.

levers.name: EU 30 Min Recycling Rate
levers.description: The minumum recycling rate for waste in EU 30.

levers.name: NAFTA Min Recycling Rate
levers.description: The minumum recycling rate for waste in NAFTA.

levers.name: ROW Min Recycling Rate
levers.description: The minumum recycling rate for waste in rest of world.

levers.name: China Incineration Investment
levers.description: Investment in expanded incineration infrastructure for China including both collection and processing.

levers.name: EU 30 Incineration Investment
levers.description: Investment in expanded incineration infrastructure for EU 30 including both collection and processing.

levers.name: NAFTA Incineration Investment
levers.description: Investment in expanded incineration infrastructure for NAFTA including both collection and processing.

levers.name: ROW Incineration Investment
levers.description: Investment in expanded incineration infrastructure for ROW including both collection and processing.

levers.name: China Landfill Investment
levers.description: Investment in expanded landfill infrastructure for China including both collection and processing.

levers.name: EU 30 Landfill Investment
levers.description: Investment in expanded landfill infrastructure for EU 30 including both collection and processing.

levers.name: NAFTA Landfill Investment
levers.description: Investment in expanded landfill infrastructure for NAFTA including both collection and processing.

levers.name: ROW Landfill Investment
levers.description: Investment in expanded landfill infrastructure for ROW including both collection and processing.

levers.name: China Maximum Mismanaged Rate
levers.description: The maximum percent of waste mismanaged for waste in China.

levers.name: EU 30 Maximum Mismanaged Rate
levers.description: The maximum percent of waste mismanaged for waste in EU 30.

levers.name: NAFTA Maximum Mismanaged Rate
levers.description: The maximum percent of waste mismanaged for waste in NAFTA.

levers.name: ROW Maximum Mismanaged Rate
levers.description: The maximum percent of waste mismanaged for waste in rest of world.

levers.name: China Packaging Consumption Tax
levers.description: The amount of tax per article imposed as a consumption tax in China.

levers.name: EU 30 Packaging Consumption Tax
levers.description: The amount of tax per article imposed as a consumption tax in EU 30.

levers.name: NAFTA Packaging Consumption Tax
levers.description: The amount of tax per article imposed as a consumption tax in NAFTA.

levers.name: ROW Packaging Consumption Tax
levers.description: The amount of tax per article imposed as a consumption tax in rest of world.

levers.name: China Recycling Cost
levers.description: How much does it cost to recycle one ton of plastics in China.

levers.name: EU 30 Recycling Cost
levers.description: How much does it cost to recycle one ton of plastics in EU 30.

levers.name: NAFTA Recycling Cost
levers.description: How much does it cost to recycle one ton of plastics in NAFTA.

levers.name: ROW Recycling Cost
levers.description: How much does it cost to recycle one ton of plastics in the rest of world.

levers.name: China Incineration Cost
levers.description: How much does it cost to incinerate one ton of plastics in China.

levers.name: EU 30 Incineration Cost
levers.description: How much does it cost to incinerate one ton of plastics in EU 30.

levers.name: NAFTA Incineration Cost
levers.description: How much does it cost to incinerate one ton of plastics in NAFTA.

levers.name: ROW Incineration Cost
levers.description: How much does it cost to incinerate one ton of plastics in rest of world.

levers.name: China Landfill Cost
levers.description: How much does it cost to landfill one ton of plastics in China.

levers.name: EU 30 Landfill Cost
levers.description: How much does it cost to landfill one ton of plastics in EU 30.

levers.name: NAFTA Landfill Cost
levers.description: How much does it cost to landfill one ton of plastics in NAFTA.

levers.name: ROW Landfill Cost
levers.description: How much does it cost to landfill one ton of plastics in rest of world.

levers.name: China Packaging Tax 50% Reference
levers.description: How much of a plastic packaging consumption tax is required to achieve a 50% reduction in plastic packaging use in China.

levers.name: EU 30 Packaging Tax 50% Reference
levers.description: How much of a plastic packaging consumption tax is required to achieve a 50% reduction in plastic packaging use in EU 30.

levers.name: NAFTA Packaging Tax 50% Reference
levers.description: How much of a plastic packaging consumption tax is required to achieve a 50% reduction in plastic packaging use in NAFTA.

levers.name: ROW Packaging Tax 50% Reference
levers.description: How much of a plastic packaging consumption tax is required to achieve a 50% reduction in plastic packaging use in rest of world.

levers.name: Packaging Tax Smoothing
levers.description: How much of a bend in the response curve expected for a packaging tax where reduction = sqrt(tax * regional factor * smoothing) / smoothing. A higher number expects smaller returns on additionally heightened tax (the rate of return in terms of behavior change diminishes faster).

levers.name: Immediate Policy Complete Year
levers.description: At what year the phase in of bans and taxes would be complete. This includes time for compliance.

levers.name: Gradual Policy Complete Year
levers.description: At what year the phase in of policies other than bans and taxes such as investment or rate / content mandates would be complete. This includes time for compliance.

levers.name: Recycling Yield Loss
levers.description: How much of recycling is lost before it is recirculated into new products.

levers.name: Recycling Circularity Delay
levers.description: How long it takes from recycling collection to use in new products for newly added or removed recycling.

levers.name: Recycling Displacement Rate
levers.description: How much of virgin plastic production is reduced or displaced by newly available recycled material.

levers.name: Recycling Lost Virgin Backfill Rate
levers.description: At what rate a reduction in virgin plastic production is replaced by increased recycling.

levers.name: Recycling Content Lost Consumption
levers.description: At what rate consumption goes down due to price increase caused by increased minium recycled material.

levers.name: China Incineration Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new incineration capacity would go to plastics in China.

levers.name: EU 30 Incineration Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new incineration capacity would go to plastics in EU 30.

levers.name: NAFTA Incineration Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new incineration capacity would go to plastics in NAFTA.

levers.name: ROW Incineration Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new incineration capacity would go to plastics in rest of world.

levers.name: China Landfill Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new landfill capacity would go to plastics in China.

levers.name: EU 30 Landfill Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new landfill capacity would go to plastics in EU 30.

levers.name: NAFTA Landfill Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new landfill capacity would go to plastics in NAFTA.

levers.name: ROW Landfill Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new landfill capacity would go to plastics in rest of world.

levers.name: Policy Start Year
levers.description: What year policies would start going into effect or start phasing in.

levers.name: Packaging Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before packaging products become waste on average for newly added or removed packaging plastic products.

levers.name: Construction Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before construction products become waste on average for newly added or removed construction plastic products.

levers.name: Textile Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before textile products become waste on average for newly added or removed textile plastic products.

levers.name: HLS Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before household, leisure, sports products become waste on average for newly added or removed HLS plastic products.

levers.name: Electronic Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before electronic products become waste on average for newly added or removed electronic plastic products.

levers.name: Transporation Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before transporation products become waste on average for newly added or removed transportation plastic products.

levers.name: Agriculture Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before agriculture products become waste on average for newly added or removed agriculture plastic products.

levers.name: Other Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before other products become waste on average for newly added or removed other plastic products.

levers.name: Demand Decrease per Cent Virgin Tax
levers.description: What percent demand will decrease for each cent per pound of tax added per pound of plastic.

levers.name: Nivi Scratchpad
levers.description: Testing.
